option.paths: limit the commit history to the given paths (comma separated)
option.no-title: disables the insertion of a h1 title at the start of the markdown document
option.no-commit-amount: disables the inclusion of commit amounts per tag
option.date-format: specifies the date format used in the markdown document. See https://github.com/lukeed/tinydate#patterns for a list of available patterns.
option.output: specifies the output file which the markdown will be written to
